title: aiml  vs cse
content: hey guys i got 107 (after grace ) and 268 in boards i expecting 15k to 18k if i am wrong pllss tell my rank range ,acc to lst year cutoff in my cat if i get the above expected rank i might get both cse aiml which is better in this ai world and acc placements in rr campus

comments.body:
It's unfortunate that you can get cs with that rank. 

And it's unfortunate you can't use the search button to find your answer

Choose core if you are getting core. Taking AIML won't help you in the job market unless you get a master's degree or a phd. And even with all that it's super tough. Core will make your life easier unless you plan on going down the higher education route
Your question or post has been answered previously. Before making a new post, always remember to search the subreddit. Duplicate posts will entail deletion.
